creator: c1vamsi1c@gmail.com
text:
Tomcat always uses default values for the following attributes irrespective of
values specified in server.xml
1. soLinger
2. soTimeout
3. serverSoTimeout
4. tcpNoDelay

creator: c1vamsi1c@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 18811
Fixes Http11Protocol class

Http11Protocol.createConnectionHandler() sets the values to default values
whether or not a value has been set earlier for the four attributes in
question.  The fix  is to set default value only if a value has not been set
earlier.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38485 ***
